恴字的基本解释

恴
dé
古同“德”。

恴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［déㄉ］
［《廣韻》多則切，入德，端。］
亦作“徳1”。亦作“恴1”。“悳1”的今字。亦作“惪1”。
(1)道德；品德。
(2)谓有道德。
(3)指有德行的人。
(4)行为；操守。
(5)善行；仁爱；仁政。
(6)恩惠；恩德。
(7)谓受到恩惠。
(8)感恩；感激。
(9)心意；情意。
(10)福庆。
(11)庆赏，赐予。
(12)德教；教化。
(13)古代指幽隐无形的“道”显现于万物，万物因“道”所得的特殊规律或特殊性质。
(14)古代特指天地化育万物的功能。
(15)古代五行之说。指一种相生相克循环不息，当运时能主宰天道人事的天然势力。相传为帝王受命之符，帝王或朝代代表一“德”。
(16)指凤凰头上的花纹。
(17)通“得”。得到。
(18)通“直”。
(19)通“植”。正立。
(20)姓。

恴字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【卯集】【心字部】　恴； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页386第16
【搜眞玉鏡】同德。

恴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
恴字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
dé
Gu Tong "de".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［déㄉ］
["Guangyun" more than cut, enter the German, end. ]
Also known as "De 1". Also known as "恴1". The present word for "悳1". Also known as "Germany 1".
(1) Morality; character.
(2) It means that there is morality.
(3) Refers to a virtuous person.
(4) Behavior; ethics.
(5) Good deeds; benevolence; benevolent governance.
(6) Favor; kindness.
(7) It means to be favored.
(8) Thanksgiving; gratitude.
(9) Mind; affection.
(10) Fuqing.
(11) Celebrate rewards, bestow.
(12) Moral education; enlightenment.
(13) In ancient times, the hidden and invisible "Dao" appeared in all things, and the special laws or special properties of all things derived from "Dao".
(14) In ancient times, it specifically refers to the function of heaven and earth to nurture all things.
(15) The ancient theory of the five elements. Refers to a natural force that regenerates and suppresses each other and can dominate the human affairs of the heavens when it is fortune. According to legend, it is a symbol of the emperor's order, and the emperor or dynasty represents a "de".
(16) Refers to the pattern on the head of the phoenix.
(17) Through "de". get.
(18) Through "straight".
(19) Through "planting". Upright.
(20) Last name.
